description:
《中国好声音》第十一期在9月20日晚播出，那英组冠军荣归何处？看着节目中那英组冠军的角逐，实在想不到那英导师在录制早上10点才刚刚打点滴出院，但是节目中却依然神采奕奕，这就是那英House的坚强和决不妥协吧！那英四位黄金战将姚贝娜、朱克、萱萱、侯磊进行了激烈地厮杀，最后大热门姚贝娜大胆突破演唱《All By Myself》，却不敌萱萱，与最后胜利失之交臂。而萱萱成为那英组冠军。

《All By Myself》

歌词：

When I was young
I never needed anyone
And making love was just for fun
Those days are gone
Livin alone
I think of all the friends Ive known
When I dial the telephone
Nobodys home
All by myself
Dont wanna be
All by myself
Anymore
Hard to be sure
Sometimes I feel so insecure
And loves so distant and obscure
Remains the cure
All by myself
Dont wanna be
All by myself
Anymore
All by myself
Dont wanna live
All by myself
Anymore
When I was young
I never needed anyone
And making love was just for fun
Those days are gone
All by myself
Dont wanna be
All by myself
Anymore
All by myself
Dont wanna live
Oh
Dont wanna live
By myself, by myself
Anymore
By myself
Anymore
Oh
All by myself
Dont wanna live
I never, never, never

  • 聪明人的10大特征 你身上具备吗？
  • BBC主播闹乌龙 误把打印纸当iPad
  • 世界上最奇葩的十大职业

title: 中国好声音：姚贝娜-All By Myself
